name: uzidd2
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))

comment: Membership of the least member in an upper set of integers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
